title: #20: Raving Arizona | Shaun Attwood
description:
Episode #20 - Shaun Attwood

Shaun Attwood has lived quite a life. From mild-mannered stockbroker, to ecstasy kingpin and convicted felon facing 200 years in an American prison, to an inspirational public speaker and best selling author of a dozen books.

We dig into the details of the supply chain he developed to smuggle and distribute millions of dollars of drugs from Europe through Mexico and into the United States. Shaun explains how he laundered the proceeds through various methods, and how he came to the realization that none of that really matters in the grand scheme of things.

A thoughtful look at some bad decisions, and how they put Shaun Attwood on a path to redemption that he still walks to this day.
